ViewObject.Name: XxcsoApproveCodeLovVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: WITH xsdwo1 AS ( SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code1 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code1 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code2 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code2 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code3 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code3 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code4 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code4 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code5 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code5 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code6 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code6 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code7 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code7 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code8 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code8 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code9 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code9 IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT xsdwo.sends_dept_code10 base_code FROM xxcso_sp_decision_wf_orgs xsdwo WHERE xsdwo.base_code = (SELECT xtsdr.app_base_code FROM xxcso_tmp_sp_dec_request xtsdr) AND xsdwo.sends_dept_code10 IS NOT NULL ) SELECT '1' range_type ,flvv2.lookup_type approval_type_code ,xev.employee_number ,xev.full_name ,xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) ) work_base_code ,(SELECT xabv.base_short_name FROM xxcso_aff_base_v2 xabv WHERE xabv.base_code = xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) ) ) work_base_short_name ,xev.full_name return_full_name ,xev.user_id user_id FROM xsdwo1 ,fnd_lookup_values_vl flvv1 ,fnd_lookup_values_vl flvv2 ,xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE flvv1.lookup_type = 'XXCSO1_SP_DECISION_LEVEL' AND flvv1.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flvv1.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) <= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND NVL(flvv1.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) >= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND flvv2.lookup_type = flvv1.attribute1 AND flvv2.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flvv2.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) <= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND NVL(flvv2.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) >= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND TO_DATE(xev.issue_date, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND xev.work_base_code_new = xsdwo1.base_code AND xev.approval_type_code_new = flvv2.lookup_code UNION ALL SELECT '1' range_type ,flvv2.lookup_type approval_type_code ,xev.employee_number ,xev.full_name ,xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) ) work_base_code ,(SELECT xabv.base_short_name FROM xxcso_aff_base_v2 xabv WHERE xabv.base_code = xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_emp_parameter( xev.work_base_code_new ,xev.work_base_code_old ,xev.issue_date ,TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) ) ) work_base_short_name ,xev.full_name return_full_name ,xev.user_id user_id FROM xsdwo1 ,fnd_lookup_values_vl flvv1 ,fnd_lookup_values_vl flvv2 ,xxcso_employees_v2 xev WHERE flvv1.lookup_type = 'XXCSO1_SP_DECISION_LEVEL' AND flvv1.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flvv1.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) <= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND NVL(flvv1.end_date_active, TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) >= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND flvv2.lookup_type = flvv1.attribute1 AND flvv2.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND NVL(flvv2.start_date_active, TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate)) <= TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND TRUNC(xxcso_util_common_pkg.get_online_sysdate) AND xev.work_base_code_old = xsdwo1.base_code AND xev.approval_type_code_old = flvv2.lookup_code UNION ALL SELECT '1' range_type ,flvv.attribute1
